document_data.name: Gwynn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gwynn''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[inventor]].
{{Quote|By Gwynn the Vampire and [[Hersent's sigil|Hersent's Sigil]]!|Sysquemalyn}}
document_data.Description: Gwynn was a prominent [[mage]] who specialized in [[inventive]] [[spell]]s.
document_data.History:
In {{Yearlink|-909}}, Gwynn invented the spell ''[[feign death]]'', which was originally known as ''Gwynn's feign death''. About a hundred years later, the arcanist invented another spell, ''[[vampiric touch]]'', which was also originally named after Gwynn, and was known as ''Gwynn's vampirism''.

''Circa'' {{Yearlink|-700}}, Gwynn's name was shouted along with those of other prominent arcanists by [[Sysquemalyn]] when she and [[Candlemas]] tried to escape the [[Nine Hells]].
